Description.Text: For a classic New York City hotel experience at remarkably affordable prices, nothing comes close to The Sohotel. Located directly off historic Bowery Blvd in the heart of downtown NYC, The Sohotel offers a wide variety rooms of and amenities in a historic building, one that has presided over the Bowery for over two hundred years. The Bowery has experienced a renaissance over the past two decades, and is now thriving in every aspect: be it the world class shops, historic cultural landmarks, delicious eats, or vibrant nightlife. Sohotel offers guestrooms with exposed brick walls and comfortable therapedic mattresses for a great night's sleep after exploring the city on foot. Appreciate the energy efficient light bulbs and appliances. The wood blinds and hardwood floors are also environmentally friendly.
The hotel is convenient to many of Manhattan's most exciting neighborhoods: • SoHo • Little Italy • Greenwich Village • China Town • Tribeca • art galleries • museums

Sohotel offers 100 comfortable rooms that are well furnished and equipped with modern amenities such as flat screen TV, alarm clock and an air conditioner. Daily maid service and Nightly Turn-Down Service is offered in all rooms.

Taking its cue from history, The Sohotel celebrates its boutique features in the building's exposed brick walls and cozy furnishing, all while showcasing a refined, modernized style in the lobby and common areas. With 100 recently renovated rooms, The Sohotel is charming and comfortable, with just enough flair to satisfy guests looking for a hip New York experience. This hotel was First known as The Westchester, then The Occidental, and The Pioneer, and now as the "THE SOHOTEL".

Driving directions from La Guardia Airport: Depart Start on Local road(s) (South-West) (0.03 Km/0.02 Mile). Turn LEFT (South-East) onto Curtis St, then immediately turn RIGHT (South-West) onto 25th Ave (1.16 Km/0.72 Mile). Bear RIGHT (West) onto Astoria Blvd (0.83 Km/0.52 Mile). Road name changes to 78th St (0.19 Km/0.12 Mile). Turn LEFT (West) onto Ramp (0.58 Km/0.36 Mile). Road name changes to Bqe E [Brooklyn Queens Expy E] (0.79 Km/0.49 Mile). Take Ramp onto I-278 [Bqe] (7.9 Km/4.91 Mile). At exit 32A, turn LEFT onto Ramp (0.77 Km/0.48 Mile). Bear RIGHT (North-West) onto Williamsburg Bridge (2.24 Km/1.39 Mile). Keep STRAIGHT onto Delancey St (0.74 Km/0.46 Mile). Turn LEFT (South) onto Bowery (0.09 Km/0.06 Mile). Total distance to location: (15.32 Km/9.52 Mile).
This hotel does not have a restaurant facility. Several restaurants are available in the surroundings, where guests can enjoy a wide variety of local, regional and international cuisines.
With many local attractions and amazing amenities; the Sohotel is the perfect place to spend your vacation Our accommodations and first class service are the staple of this prime location
